description:
PyCon is the largest annual gathering for the community using and developing the open-source Python programming language. [PyCon is organized by the Python community for the community](http://us.pycon.org/2015/about/what-is-pycon/). We try to keep registration far cheaper than most comparable technology conferences, to keep PyCon accessible to the widest group possible. PyCon is a [diverse](http://us.pycon.org/2015/about/diversity/) conference dedicated to providing an enjoyable experience to everyone. Our [code of conduct](http://us.pycon.org/2015/about/code-of-conduct/) is intended to help everyone maintain the PyCon spirit. We thank all attendees and staff for observing it.

Slides can be found at: <https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2015> and <https://github.com/PyCon/2015-slides>

Captions: <https://archive.org/details/PyconUs2015Captions>
title: PyCon US 2015
